name: Unity Voxel Destruction
description:
This is a demo game for my Unity Asset "Voxel Destruction".

Asset store link coming soon (still in review)

This game contains 3 fully destructible voxel buildings modeled in MagicaVoxel and created using my Package. You can try out the performance of the destruction yourself, it will be available on the unity asset store for $9,69. 

This demo is using the "Graphy" unity package to display fps and performance
